avatar.description: Shows the avatar of the mentioned member.

ping.description: Displays the average ping of the bot.

errors.onlyMods: :x: Only moderators can execute this command :x:
errors.onlyAdmin: :x: Only admin can run this command :x:

uptime.result: Online time: `{days} day(s),{hours} hour(s), {minutes} minute(s), {seconds} second(s)`

setmod.description: Set positions to moderate the bot.

locale.description: Set the language of the bot.
locale.localeIsNull: :x: Missing to type the language (en | pt_br)

common.errorNotChannel: You need to join a voice channel first!
common.cooldownMessage: Please wait {time} second(s) more before using the `{name}` command again.
